TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsConst extends System.Object
public ref class IsConst abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示修饰的类型有一个 修饰符。

span.span: Indicates that the modified type has a modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft c + + 编译器发出此修饰符进入任何参数，返回类型的元数据或对象声明声明为`const`的源代码中。The Microsoft C++ compiler emits this modifier into metadata for any parameter, return type, or object declaration declared as `const` in the source code. 编译器发出元数据更改，在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值时的默认行为是不适当的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选的修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法如类， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，并组合成与文件[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何发出使用反射的程序集的对象。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
